scripts.dev: concurrently -n Client,Server -c cyan,magenta "cd client && PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=development npm run start" "NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js"
scripts.cloudstart: concurrently -n Client,Server -c cyan,magenta "cd client && PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=production npm run cloudstart" "NODE_ENV=production node server.js"
